title: UNDERWRAPS Mens 1960s Fun Retro Hippie Costume - Boogie Down
features: This costume is a two piece ensemble including a bright colored shirt with flower and peace designs and bell bottom pants with matching inset design.
This package contains costume only, beaded necklace and sandals are not included.
This costume comes in Men's one size standard - (Neck 16.5" Waist 34-38 Chest 42-46") and Men's XXL -(Neck 18-18.5" Waist 42" Chest 48-50").
Hand wash, Hang dry. Do not iron. For best results, steam to release wrinkles from packaging.
This costume is ideal for stage performances, costume parties, Halloween, and any dress up occasion! Fabric 100 percent polypoplin
description: Become the vision of peace and love in this groovy retro costume. This hippie inspired costume is ideal for costume parties, themed events, stage performances, Halloween, and any other costume event. This costume pairs perfectly with "Women's Retro Hippie Costume - Summer"

title: Watt's Wigs: Fun Costumes at Fun Prices
